column1: Aek Godang Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Aek Godang) (IATA: AEG
column2: ICAO: WIME) is an airport in South Tapanuli Regency
column4: Indonesia. The Airport is located 30 km East from the Padang Sidempuan. The Airport resides at an elevation of 281 m (922 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 11/29 with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column6: 580 ft x 98 ft) in length. The operation of the Airport is managed by UPT Ditjen Hubud
column7: an agency under Ministry of Transportation
column8: Indonesia. Flight Destinations Airlines and destinations connecting to Aek Godang Airport: Airline Name Destination Susi Air Medan
